definitions.definition: A thing that causes horror ; a terrifying thing, particularly a prospective bad consequence asserted as likely to result from an act.
A person wearing a comic or grotesque costume in a parade of horribles .

main_definition: A thing that causes horror ; a terrifying thing, particularly a prospective bad consequence asserted as likely to result from an act.
secondary_definitions: A person wearing a comic or grotesque costume in a parade of horribles .
